text: Cruel Intentions is a 1998 American romantic teen drama movie set in New York City. It is about seduction, manipulation and lies. Sarah Michelle Gellar plays Kathryn Merteuil, Ryan Phillippe plays her stepbrother Sebastian Valmont, Reese Witherspoon plays Annette Hargrove, Selma Blair plays Cecile Caldwell and Swoosie Kurtz plays Regina. Cruel Intentions got mixed reviews while playing in theaters, though it made close to $76 million. The movie became a cult favorite in the years after its release. == Other websites == * Category:1999 LGBT movies Category:1999 romantic drama movies Category:1990s teen drama movies Category:1990s teen romance movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American teen drama movies Category:American teen romance movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Narcissism in fiction Category:Teen LGBT movies Category:Cruel Intentions movies
title: Cruel Intentions
